import React,{useState}from'react';import'./SkillsAndTechnologies.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const skillsData=[{title:"Adaptability & Resilience",description:"Gained through working diverse jobs such as waiter, barman, and gardener. ];const SkillsAndTechnologies=()=>{const[openSkillIndex,setOpenSkillIndex]=useState(null);const[openTechIndex,setOpenTechIndex]=useState(null);const toggleSkill=index=>{setOpenSkillIndex(openSkillIndex===index?null:index);};const toggleTech=index=>{setOpenTechIndex(openTechIndex===index?null:index);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"skills-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Skills & Technologies"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills-technologies-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"column-title",children:"Skills"}),skillsData.map((skill,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-item",onClick:()=>toggleSkill(index),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:skill.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`arrow ${openSkillIndex===index?'rotate':''}`,children:"\u25B6"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`skill-description ${openSkillIndex===index?'open':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:skill.description})})]},index))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"technologies-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"column-title",children:"Technologies"}),technologiesData.map((tech,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tech-item",onClick:()=>toggleTech(index),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tech-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:tech.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`arrow ${openTechIndex===index?'rotate':''}`,children:"\u25B6"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`tech-description ${openTechIndex===index?'open':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:tech.description})})]},index))]})]})]});};export default SkillsAndTechnologies;
